pageTitle: AI Music Generator - Create Songs with AI
pageDescription: Generate professional quality music with vocals using AI. Create songs up to 5 minutes with lyrics, choose from various styles and moods. Professional mastering available.
heading: AI Music Generator
subheading: Create professional songs with AI-generated vocals and instrumentals

vocals.title: AI Vocals
vocals.description: Generate realistic vocals with lyrics in any style. Male, female, or custom voices.

duration.title: Up to 5 Minutes
duration.description: Create full-length songs up to 5 minutes. Perfect for complete tracks with verses and choruses.

mastering.title: Professional Mastering
mastering.description: Enhance your tracks with AI-powered mastering. Three intensity levels for perfect sound.

styles.title: Multiple Styles
styles.description: Choose from pop, rock, electronic, jazz, classical and many more musical styles.
